net.librec.math.algorithm

Class KernelSmoothing

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.librec.math.algorithm.KernelSmoothing

  • public class KernelSmoothing
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class implementing kernel smoothing functions used in Local Low-Rank Matrix Approximation (LLORMA).

    2013. 6. 11
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
